caption.p: Monthly mean soil temperature (Tsoil) at ten sites as a weighted mean over 10 and 20 cm soil depths for the medium soil type for (a) May, (b) June and (c) July with the high‐emission scenario. Values are for the recent times covering 1961 to 1990 (dark grey), 2040s (medium grey) and 2080s (light grey) and assume a variable canopy and irrigation. The box whisker shows the range for 100 perturbations for each of 50 possible years provided by the weather generator. The whiskers indicate the most extreme values. The horizontal dashed lines indicate the temperatures used in Figure 2 and Fig. S1
